title: Game crashes
body: So... I queued up in Flex to do my second promo. After champ select, next thing I know, it says i disconnected. I try to reconnect several times, and it says the same thing over again. Eventually, it works, and I get into game 5 seconds before my team surrenders for a remake. Now I have leaverbuster, and I couldn't play a game that day anymore. Also, my computer doesn't lag a lot and like never crashes. Anyone know why this happened?

replies.body: It sounds like your network might just be having a hard time getting a solid connection with our game servers specifically. It might be some random firewall setting, but let's make sure to update the rest of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) just to be sure.
